title: ORMEvictQueries
name: ORMEvictQueries
description:
This will remove all the queries from the named query cache.
If name is not specified, all quiries from default cache will be removed.
ormEvictQueries([cacheName])

arguments.name: datasource
arguments.description: datasource used for the session, if nor defined the datasource defined in application.cfc/cfapplication is used.
